frame.tag: inline-flex items-center px-[10px] h-7 rounded-[9px] bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-[24px] text-white/50 hover:text-white/80 hover:bg-white/5 transition-all duration-200 cursor-grab active:cursor-grabbing border border-white/5 w-fit
frame.body: relative rounded-[12px] overflow-hidden border border-white/10 shadow-[0_32px_64px_-16px_rgba(0,0,0,0.5)] bg-black/20

navBar.nav: relative flex items-center gap-1 p-1 rounded-[16px] backdrop-blur-[32px] bg-black/50 border border-white/10
navBar.item: relative w-16 h-12 flex items-center justify-center rounded-[12px] transition-all duration-200

chat.wrapper: flex flex-col gap-8 w-[400px] max-w-[var(--max-page-content-width)] relative z-10 pb-4
chat.inputForm: relative flex items-center bg-white/[0.03] border border-white/10 rounded-[14px] transition-all duration-500 ease-premium overflow-hidden
